parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To do, perform, accomplish; be in any condition, i.e. I fare; I exact, require.
Or neuter pleion, or pleon comparative of polus; more in quantity, number, or quality; also the major portion.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: To give orders to, prescribe, arrange. From dia and tasso; to arrange thoroughly, i.e. institute, prescribe, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
